TestCaseMetaData.name: EHR Test Plan
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.Notes: To support real-time dynamic testing, the Tester at their discretion, may selectively modify result report data prior to importing the test message into the EHR technology. The test data for MSH.21 demonstrates the use of profile components; the system-under-test may alternatively use the post or pre-coordinated profile identifier(s).
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the EHR test plan. It involves display and incorporation verification at different levels (see juror document for details).
